title: Dan Fawcus
text:
Daniel G. Fawcus (1858 – 1925) was an English professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and administrator active throughout Europe.
Career.
Fawcus was a player of Italian club <a href="Genoa%20C.F.C.">Genoa</a> between 1898 and 1900, after being one of the original founders of the club in 1893. By 1901 Fawcus had become Genoa's president, and started a three-yearly competition called the <a href="Fawcus%20Cup">Fawcus Cup</a>.
